REPORT TO CONGRESS. The Secretary must submit a report to the Committee on Energy and Commerce of the House of Representatives every two years, listing waivers granted, substances selected for review, outcomes of reviews, remedial actions taken, and substances determined to have no harm certainty. To ensure no harm certainty under section 2(c)(5), a review of potential alternatives for use in food and beverage containers is required.
